required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Food and Increased Gastric pH Value on Bioavailability of a Single Dose of BI 207127 in Healthy Caucasian and Japanese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Investigation of the Effect of Food and of Increased Gastric pH on the Relative Bioavailability of Deleobuvir Following Single Oral Administration in Healthy Caucasian and Japanese Subjects (an Open-label, Randomised, Four-way Crossover Study)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this trial is to investigate the effect of food with different fat content and of gastric pH increase (mediated by multiple dosing of omeprazole) on the relative bioavailability of deleobuvir.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (h) before drug administration and 30 minutes (min), 1h, 1h 30min, 2h, 2h 30min, 3h, 4h, 5h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h and 48h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of deleobuvir in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable data point (AUC0-tz)

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (h) before drug administration and 30 minutes (min), 1h, 1h 30min, 2h, 2h 30min, 3h, 4h, 5h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h and 48h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of deleobuvir in plasma (Cmax)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (h) before drug administration and 30 minutes (min), 1h, 1h 30min, 2h, 2h 30min, 3h, 4h, 5h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h and 48h after drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of deleobuvir in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-inf)

arm_group.description: patient to receive BI 207127 as a single dose in fasted state
patient to receive BI 207127 as a single dose after a high fat breakfast
patient to receive BI 207127 as a single dose after a low fat breakfast
patient to receive BI 207127 as a single dose after 4 days treatment with Omeprazole 40 mg once a day

intervention.description: BI 207127 as a single dose after a high fat breakfast
BI 207127 as a single dose after 4 days treatment of Omeprazole 40 mg once a day
BI 207127 as a single dose in fasted state
BI 207127 as a single dose after a low fat breakfast

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Healthy males or females according to the investigators assessment, as based on the following criteria: a complete medical history including a physical examination, vital signs (BP, PR), 12-lead ECG, and clinical laboratory tests. Subjects will be either Caucasian or Japanese (first generation Japanese: born in Japan with parents of Japanese descent, and not more than 5 years out of Japan, documented by medical interview and by appropriate materials - e.g. passport, birth certificate, etc)
- Age 20 to 35 years (incl.)
- BMI 18.5 to 25 kg/m2 (incl.)
Exclusion criteria:
- Any finding in the medical examination (including BP, PR or ECG) deviating from normal and judged clinically relevant by the investigator
- Repeated measurement of systolic blood pressure greater than 140 mm Hg or diastolic blood pressure greater than 90 mm Hg
- Any laboratory value outside the reference range that the investigator considers to be of clinical relevance
- Any evidence of a concomitant disease judged clinically relevant by the investigator
- Gastrointestinal, hepatic, renal, respiratory, cardiovascular, metabolic, immunological or hormonal disorders
- Surgery of the gastrointestinal tract that could interfere with kinetics of the study drug(s)
- Diseases of the central nervous system (such as epilepsy), other neurological disorders or psychiatric disorders

participant_flow.recruitment_details: It was planned that 16 healthy Caucasian subjects (males and females, at least one third of each sex) and 16 healthy Japanese subjects (both males + females, at least one third of each sex) would enter the study. They were recruited from the volunteers' pool of the trial site. Due to early study termination, no Japanese subjects were randomised.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: All subjects were screened for eligibility to participate in the trial. Subjects attended specialist sites which would then ensure that the subject met all strictly implemented inclusion/exclusion criteria. Subjects were not to be randomised to trial treatment if any one of the specific entry criteria were violated.

group.title: Dele Fasted / Dele High Fat / Dele + OMP / Dele Low Fat
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Deleobuvir (Dele) film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 hours (h), followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h after 4 days of pre-treatment with a 40 mg Omeprazole (OMP) gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised low-fat meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. All medications were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele High Fat / Dele Low Fat / Dele Fasted / Dele + OMP
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised low-fat meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h after 4 days of pre-treatment with a 40 mg OMP gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily. All medications were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele Low Fat / Dele + OMP / Dele High Fat / Dele Fasted
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised low-fat meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h after 4 days of pre-treatment with a 40 mg OMP gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. All medications were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele + OMP / Dele Fasted / Dele Low Fat / Dele High Fat
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h after 4 days of pre-treatment with a 40 mg OMP gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised low-fat meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h, followed by a washout phase of at least 6 days; then each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. All medications were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

baseline.population: Treated Set (TS): included all subjects who were dispensed study medication and were documented to have taken at least 1 dose of deleobuvir or OMP.

group.title: Dele Fasted / Dele High Fat / Dele + OMP / Dele Low Fat
group.description: Dele fasted, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a standardised high-fat, high- calorie meal, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a 4 days pre-treatment with a 40 mg Omeprazole (OMP) gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a standardised low-fat meal. Each Dele intake is a single dose of 3x 200mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The duration of a washout phase was at least 6 days.

group.title: Dele High Fat / Dele Low Fat / Dele Fasted / Dele + OMP
group.description: Dele after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a standardised low-fat meal, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele fasted, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a 4 days pre-treatment with a 40 mg OMP gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily. Each Dele intake is a single dose of 3x 200mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The duration of a washout phase was at least 6 days.

group.title: Dele Low Fat / Dele + OMP / Dele High Fat / Dele Fasted
group.description: Dele after a standardised low-fat meal, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a 4 days pre-treatment with a 40 mg OMP gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele fasted. Each Dele intake is a single dose of 3x 200mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The duration of a washout phase was at least 6 days.

group.title: Dele + OMP / Dele Fasted / Dele Low Fat / Dele High Fat
group.description: Dele after a 4 days pre-treatment with a 40 mg OMP gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele fasted, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a standardised low-fat meal, followed by a washout phase, followed by Dele after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal. Each Dele intake is a single dose of 3x 200mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The duration of a washout phase was at least 6 days.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: AUC(0-tz)
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of deleobuvir in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable data point (AUC0-tz)
outcome.time_frame: 1 hour (h) before drug administration and 30 minutes (min), 1h, 1h 30min, 2h, 2h 30min, 3h, 4h, 5h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h and 48h after drug administration
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS): included all subjects in the Treated Set who provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary pharmacokinetic (PK) endpoint that was not affected by important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

group.title: Dele Fasted
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The tablets were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele High Fat
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The tablets were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele Low Fat
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised low-fat meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The tablets were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele + OMP
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h after 4 days of pre-treatment with a 40 mg Omeprazole (OMP) gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily. All medications were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

measure.title: AUC(0-tz)
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of deleobuvir in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable data point (AUC0-tz)
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS): included all subjects in the Treated Set who provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary pharmacokinetic (PK) endpoint that was not affected by important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

analysis.groups_desc: The difference between the expected means for log(Dele low fat) and log(Dele fasted) was estimated by the differences in the adjusted means (Least Squares Means), and a 2 sided 90% confidence interval (CI) based on the t-distribution was computed. These were then back transformed. The estimation model included effects accounting for the following sources of variation: 'sequence', 'subjects within sequence', 'period', and 'treatment'.
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: The actual number of subjects analyzed is 16. No formal statistical hypothesis was tested.
analysis.p_value_desc: The p-value relates to the null hypothesis of non-equivalence (bioequivalence test). P-value for ratio outside interval 80-125%.
analysis.estimate_desc: This model included effects accounting for the following sources of variation: ‘sequence’, ‘subjects within sequence’, ‘period’, and ‘treatment’. The statistical analysis result is based on the adjusted means.

outcome.title: Cmax
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of deleobuvir in plasma (Cmax)

outcome.population: PKS - Due to premature discontinuation of the study, this endpoint was not evaluated.

reported_events.time_frame: From the time of first administration of the respective treatment until start of the next treatment or until the day after the termination date (or until 3 days after administration of last study drug, whichever occurred later), up to 37 days.

group.title: Dele Fasted
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The tablets were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele High Fat
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised high-fat, high-calorie meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The tablets were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele Low Fat
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after a standardised low-fat meal after an overnight fast of at least 10 h. The tablets were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: Dele + OMP
group.description: Each subject received a single dose of 3 x 200 mg Dele film-coated tablets after an overnight fast of at least 10 h after 4 days of pre-treatment with a 40 mg Omeprazole (OMP) gastro-resistant hard capsule once daily. All medications were administered oral with 240 mL of water.

group.title: OMP Alone
group.description: One gastro-resistant hard capsule of Omeprazole (OMP) (40 mg) once daily in the evening for 4 days administered oral with 240 mL of water.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Other - Boehringer Ingelheim (BI) acknowledges that investigators have the right to publish the study results. Investigators shall provide BI with a copy of any publication or presentation for review prior to any submission. Such review will be done with regard to proprietary information, information related to patentable inventions, medical, scientific, and statistical accuracy within 60 days. BI may request a delay of the publication in order to protect BI's intellectual property rights.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: As the study was discontinued prematurely, the results were incomplete. Due to this incomplete data the endpoint AUC(0-inf) was not evaluated,and only a limited number of the planned statistical analyses could be performed.
